revised_title: The History and Provenance of Newton's Early Reflecting Telescopes
tldr: This article discusses the history and provenance of Isaac Newton's early reflecting telescopes. It explores the development of reflecting telescopes, their advantages over refracting telescopes, and the role of the Royal Society in preserving and studying Newton's telescopes. The article also examines the different designs and materials used in Newton's telescopes, as well as their impact on the field of astronomy.
